```{r, layout="l-body-outset", echo = FALSE}

dat <- readxl::read_excel(here::here("data", "all_overviews-updated2-inriched2.xlsx"))
```

# Total number of publications: `r nrow(dat)`



## Publication by year

```{r, layout="l-middle-outset", echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(highcharter)

pby <- dat %>% 
  count(publication_year, name = "Counts")

pby %>%
  hchart('column', hcaes(x = publication_year, y = Counts),
         style = list(fontWeight = "bold", fontSize = "30px")) %>% 
  hc_xAxis(title = list(text = "Publication Year")) %>% 
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_economist())

```
